mapper.select: select u.username, u.photo, c.create_time createTime, p.title, p.id postID, f1.content as hisContent, f1.id as firstConId from comment_notification c join user u on u.id = c.sender_id join post p on (p.id = c.replied_id and c.comment_type = 0) join first_comment f1 on f1.id = c.comment_id where c.receiver_id = #{id} and c.sender_id!=#{id} and is_read = 0 order by c.create_time desc

select u.username, u.photo, c.create_time as createTime, c.comment_type, c.replied_id, if(c.comment_type = 1, f.content, s.content) as myContent, if(c.comment_type = 1, f.post_id, f1.post_id) as postID, if(c.comment_type = 1, f.id, f1.id) as firstConId, s2.content as hisContent, s2.id as secondConId
from comment_notification c left join user u on u.id = c.sender_id left join first_comment f on (f.id = c.replied_id and c.comment_type = 1) left join second_comment s on (s.id = c.replied_id and c.comment_type = 2) left join second_comment s2 on s2.id = c.comment_id left join first_comment f1 on f1.id = s.first_comment_id
where c.receiver_id = #{id} and c.sender_id!=#{id} and c.comment_type != 0 and is_read=0 order by c.create_time desc
